Class Buffer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Buffer<T>

  •  class Buffer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    class Buffer acts as a generic storage class

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) T[] data
      array of supplied type
      (package private) int head
      index of the start of the buffer
      (package private) java.lang.String name
      name of the buffer
      (package private) int size
      size of the buffer
      (package private) int tail
      index of the end of the buffer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Buffer(java.lang.String n, int sz)
      initializes name and size of buffer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) boolean empty()
      checks whether buffer is empty
      (package private) boolean full()
      checks whether buffer is full
      (package private) T get()
      returns a single item from head of the buffer if buffer is not empty and null otherwise
      (package private) boolean store(T t)
      stores a single item in buffer if space is available and dropped otherwise

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      int sz)

    • Method Detail

      • empty

        boolean empty()
        checks whether buffer is empty
        Returns:
        true if buffer is empty and false otherwise

      • full

        boolean full()
        checks whether buffer is full
        Returns:
        true if buffer is full and false otherwise

      • store

        boolean store(T t)
        stores a single item in buffer if space is available and dropped otherwise
        Parameters:
        t - element of type T that should be stored
        Returns:
        true of storage was successful and false otherwise

      • get

        T get()
        returns a single item from head of the buffer if buffer is not empty and null otherwise
        Returns:
        a single item from head of the buffer if buffer is not empty and null otherwise
